# firekit

![University of Tasmania Fire Centre](fc_logo.png)

University of Tasmania Fire Centre

An R package containing a variety of functions developed by the
[University of Tasmania Fire Centre](https://firecentre.org.au/). This
includes functions for calculating a range of fire weather indices,
calculating spatial landscape metrics over fire regime rasters, and a
spatial model of urban-rural fire risk incorporating radiant heat and
ember transport.

Package development was support by [Natural Hazards Research
Australia](https://www.naturalhazards.com.au) project [Bushfire Risk a
the Urban-Rural
Interface](https://www.naturalhazards.com.au/research/research-projects/bushfire-risk-rural-urban-interface).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`FBW_calc()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/FBW_calc.md)
  : Fuel Break Width Calculator
- [`FBW_calc_FFDI()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/FBW_calc_FFDI.md)
  : Fuel Break Width Calculator With Variable FFDI
- [`RAD_calc()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/RAD_calc.md)
  : Radiant Heat Calculator
- [`RS_to_MFI()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/RS_to_MFI.md)
  : Convert Rate of Spread to Moorland FDI
- [`calc_MFDI()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_MFDI.md)
  : Calculate Moorland Fire Danger Index
- [`calc_SDI()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_SDI.md)
  : Calculate Mount's Soil Dryness Index (SDI)
- [`calc_ember_risk()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_ember_risk.md)
  : Calculate ember risk
- [`calc_lsm()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_lsm.md)
  : calc_lsm
- [`calc_rad_risk()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_rad_risk.md)
  : Calculate radiant-heat risk index for properties
- [`calc_rad_risk_FFDI()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_rad_risk_FFDI.md)
  : Calculate radiant-heat risk index for properties for defined FFDI
- [`calc_view_factor()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/calc_view_factor.md)
  : Calculate View Factor
- [`classify_tsf()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/classify_tsf.md)
  : classify_tsf
- [`compass_vectors()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/compass_vectors.md)
  : Construct 8 line vectors in cardinal directions from a point over a
  distance
- [`dayintegral()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/dayintegral.md)
  : Calculate number of hours of sunlight for a given day
- [`daylengths()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/daylengths.md)
  : Calculate a vector of day lengths for a given latitude, by julian
  day
- [`determineMaxViewFactor()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/determineMaxViewFactor.md)
  : Determine Maximum View Factor
- [`fc_index()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fc_index.md)
  : fc_index
- [`fc_remove()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fc_remove.md)
  : fc_remove
- [`fc_write()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fc_write.md)
  : fc_write
- [`ffdi()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/ffdi.md) :
  Calculator for single Forest Fire Danger Index calculation
- [`fhi_curve()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fhi_curve.md)
  : fhi_curve
- [`fhi_nls()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fhi_nls.md)
  : fhi_nls
- [`fire_pal()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fire_pal.md)
  : fire_pal
- [`fire_project()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fire_project.md)
  : fire_project
- [`fire_tbl()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/fire_tbl.md)
  : fire_tbl
- [`firekit_update()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/firekit_update.md)
  : firekit_update
- [`forest_behav()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/forest_behav.md)
  : Forest fire behaviour parameters from FFDI and Fuel Load
- [`generate_max_run()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/generate_max_run.md)
  : Precalculate max fire run distance
- [`generate_property_fields()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/generate_property_fields.md)
  : Precalculate landscape fields reqired for landscape risk
  calculations
- [`get_ET()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/get_ET.md)
  : Get Evapotranspiration value for given Temperature and Soil Dryness
  Index
- [`get_moor_FM()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/get_moor_FM.md)
  : Calculates Moorland FDI Fuel Moisture
- [`get_moor_HF()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/get_moor_HF.md)
  : Calculate moorland FDI humidity factor
- [`get_moor_RF()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/get_moor_RF.md)
  : Calculate Moorland FDI Rainfall Factor
- [`get_moor_RS()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/get_moor_RS.md)
  : Calculate Moorland FDI rate of spread
- [`hourwatt()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/hourwatt.md)
  : Calculate radiation in W/m2 for a given latitude, hour of day and
  day of year
- [`line_vector()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/line_vector.md)
  : Construct line vector from a point over a given distance
- [`nw_vector()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/nw_vector.md)
  : Generate sf vector line in a given direction from point, default
  north-west
- [`pkgs()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/pkgs.md) :
  pkgs
- [`pprint()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/pprint.md)
  : pprint
- [`predict_ember()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/predict_ember.md)
  : Calculate 95th percentile ember distance from FDI, slope and fuel
  load
- [`shift_poly()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/shift_poly.md)
  : Extend and shift a polygon by a given angle and distance
- [`slope_vector()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/slope_vector.md)
  : Calculate slope based on regression over a given distance and angle
  across a DEM
- [`sslp()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/sslp.md) :
  Regress slope from vector of elevations
- [`sunaltitude()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/sunaltitude.md)
  : Calculate sun altitude for given latitude, day and time
- [`theme_fire()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/theme_fire.md)
  : theme_fire
- [`threshold_curve()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/threshold_curve.md)
  : threshold_curve
- [`threshold_nls()`](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/reference/threshold_nls.md)
  : threshold_nls

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Landscape Fire Hazard Model -
  Firekit](https://fire-centre.github.io/firekit/articles/landscape_model.md):
